channel.title: Paypal
channel.description:
Huge problem. I basically can't get a Paypal account without getting a new bank account.
Here's what happened.
Long time ago made a fake UK paypal account to use for selling RS GP. Made about two hundred dollars on it.
Tried to make a paypal account a few months ago, logged me into my old one.
So I added my bank account cause I have one now and withdrew all the funds. Free money hell yeah.
My account needs to be verified or something and with that I need like 9 different documents and shit that I don't have. And I can't close the account unless it's verified.
Then I get hit with this bullshit about whenever I log in it directly goes to an error page like Sorry — your last action could not be completed
No matter what. Apparently it's a very popular error and a lot of people get it.
So I can't log onto that account at all now. I made a new account but I can't add my bank because it says it's in use by another account.
Help?

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

io9:

Bitch to PayPal, then have fun not getting your problem solved.

Paypal has like 0 staff

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I’m not using it, I’m under it.

Kinda like a hierarchy.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Fishstix Fishstix
item.description:
@Fishstix wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:5, topic:257291”]That might sound alright once I start getting a lot more money.

Do you know if you can send money from paypal to a bank account if it’s not the one on it?[/quote]
Well you’d need to get a reloadable one, which requires your own bank account

But you can get gift cards with up to $200.00 on them so that’s nice

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That might sound alright once I start getting a lot more money.

Do you know if you can send money from paypal to a bank account if it’s not the one on it?

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Fishstix Fishstix
item.description:
@Fishstix wrote:

…Get a prepaid gift card then, you can open a paypal with them. They have there own bank account alrady set into them, well i’m pretty sure they do. But unless your 18 you can’t get reloadable ones as they need a bank account that you have.

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=visa+gift+cards

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That’d be a weird situation because I’m under my parents account with a student account.

Have to go through them.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Fishstix Fishstix
item.description:
@Fishstix wrote:

Well if it’s possible you can try to cancle the bank account you have know and open a new one to use on your paypal, but I’m sure if you try and contact them they can help you. Or just get a prepaid debit card at a local market, I just get prepaid visa gift cards, I’m pretty sure you can open a paypal with them. Then you can put the money from your gift card into the paypal account

Read full topic
